PackageOracle.name: DA_ON_DEMAND_MOVIE
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_ON_DEMAND_MOVIE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.02.974999000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,on_demand_content_id IN NUMBER
,title_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,on_demand_content_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_on_demand_movie;

body.name: DA_ON_DEMAND_MOVIE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_ON_DEMAND_MOVIE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.02.986017000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_on_demand_movie.add(fx), parms=' || title_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_on_demand_movie a
(
a.on_demand_content_id
,a.title_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_on_demand_content_id.NEXTVAL
,add.title_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.on_demand_content_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_on_demand_movie.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_on_demand_movie.add, parms=' || title_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_on_demand_movie a
(
a.on_demand_content_id
,a.title_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_on_demand_content_id.NEXTVAL
,add.title_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_on_demand_movie.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,on_demand_content_id IN NUMBER
,title_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_on_demand_movie.add, parms=' || on_demand_content_id || '|' || title_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_on_demand_movie a
(
a.on_demand_content_id
,a.title_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.on_demand_content_id
,add.title_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_on_demand_movie.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,on_demand_content_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_on_demand_movie.del, parms=' || on_demand_content_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_on_demand_movie a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.on_demand_content_id = del.on_demand_content_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_on_demand_movie.del');

END del;

END da_on_demand_movie;
